= Installation =

{{{bash
sudo pacman -S docker docker-compose
export PORT=80 
docker pull searx/searx
docker run --rm -d -v ${PWD}/searx:/etc/searx -p $PORT:8080 -e BASE_URL=http://localhost:$PORT/ searx/searx
}}}
